title: Bombtrack and Columbia Sportswear: Rover and Wanderlust Travelshirts
content: Bombtrack, makers of bicycles for travel, teamed up with Columbia Sportswear, makers of outdoor apparel on these new Rover and Wanderlust Travelshirts for men and women. You can watch the Wanderlust video here and see all the information on these new shirts at Bombtrack.
author: prolly
